Job Description: 12Th Pass / Graduate / Post Graduate (Except B.E/ B.Tech / M.E / M.Tech / CA / CS / LLB / BDS / MBBS)    Experience Required: Fresher or experienced both.    Basic Knowledge of BPOs Min.   Typing Speed 10-15 words per minute    Basic Computer Skills    Target Oriented Attitude
